docs.text:
Generic Login System




login


http POST:
  
http://172.25.33.42:8080/login


JSON
  


{    
    
record
:    
gander
,  
    
email
:     
youremail@gmail.com
,  
    
password
:  
Abc123@!
  
}    




Considerations
  




record
 would be the name of the system you're loging in e.g. 
(gander, tokenlab, mistwallet)


password
 must be minimum 8 character, with one Upper one lower character and a digit 


email
 and 
password
 format is validated on the server as well








Signup


http POST:
  
http://172.25.33.42:8079/signup


JSON
  


{    
    
record
:    
gander
,
    
username
:  
test user
,  
    
email
:     
youremail@gmail.com
,  
    
password
:  
Abc123@!
  
}    




Considerations
  




record
 would be the name of the system you're loging in e.g. 
(gander, tokenlab, mistwallet)


password
 must be minimum 8 character, with one Upper one lower character and a digit 


whole document format is validated on the server
